# Copilot Instructions

This repository contains **paraty_geocore.js** â€” a JavaScript library providing core classes for geolocation applications.

## Status

This project is in its initial state. No source files, package manager setup, or tooling exist yet.

## Intended Purpose

- JavaScript (not TypeScript) geolocation utility/core classes
- Intended to be consumed as a library by geolocation applications
- Licensed under MIT
